commenter_a: I'm not sure I agree with that statement because regardless of whether their parents are immigrants, they too have the ability to become Americans. After all we were all once immigrants and at one time even if we ourselves are not immigrants, we were born on American soil from an ancestry of immigrants and for that reason we too are Americans. I agree with many things about you Senator Vitter, but I have to say on this I don't agree.
